QuestData.Title: Friendship For Granted
QuestData.Description:
Alright! The R.A.D.D.E.R.E.R is calibrated and ready to go--for you!
Why am I not using it? Simple!
You have to think of and consider all the possibilities.
Let's say it blows up. Who would fix it if I am injured, unconscious, or dead? Could you imagine?
Now, go dispel the barrier so we can return to camp and get Lathos patched up. I'll be... standing back.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the R.A.D.D.E.R.E.R to dispel the arcane barrier.
QuestData.RewardText:
Just like that he's... gone?
He gave his life to save us because the R.A.... the machine didn't work.
Lathos believed in me... I should have listened... I let him down...
